column3: Latest;Prey Veng: Two suspects were arrested for stealing cell phone antenna equipment from Citi Telecom on July 26
column5: at 2:40 pm on National Road 8 between Km 55-56 Pea Reang Village
column7: Prey Veng province.------Police in Pea Reang police in cooperation with representatives of Citi Telecoms arrested two suspects for stealing devices from cell phone antennas of Citi in Sithor commune
column9: Kandal province.------The two suspects: 1st / Keo Vannak
column12: and a 19-year-old male were taken away along with a 4Runner car and 32 heavy duty batteries.
